headline: Hasbro, Inc. (HAS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Hasbro, Inc. on Sleepysol’s Newsletter’s Substack by Sleepysol. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HAS. Hasbro, Inc.’s share was trading at $74.63 as of August 1st. HAS’s trailing and forward P/E were 35.61 and 18.48, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Hasbro (HAS) appears significantly undervalued, trading […]
